title: 3 Simple Ways to Check Your Excel Version

steps.title: Open Microsoft Excel.
steps.content: Open Microsoft Excel . Microsoft Excel is available on Windows and Mac . You can also use the online web version at https://www.office.com .

steps.title: Click the File menu (if a file is open).
steps.content: Click the File menu (if a file is open). If Excel was already open and you have a spreadsheet on your screen, click File at the top-left corner. If you just opened Excel but haven't opened a spreadsheet , skip this step.

steps.title: Click Account.
steps.content: Click Account . This will be at the bottom of the left panel. If you see Help , click that instead.

steps.title: View your Product Information.
steps.content: View your Product Information. This is the section on the right side of the window. Find your Product name underneath the Microsoft or Office logo. It will look like: Microsoft Office 365, Office Home & Student, or other. Find your Version number underneath About Excel . It will look like "Version 2401 (Build 17231.20194 Click-to-Run)"

steps.title: Open Microsoft Excel.
steps.content: Open Microsoft Excel. If you're working on a current project, you'll want to save it before continuing. You'll be able to open the program from your Applications folder in Finder.

steps.title: Click the Excel menu.
steps.content: Click the Excel menu. This is in the top menu bar, next to the Apple logo. A drop-down menu will open.

steps.title: Click About Microsoft Excel.
steps.content: Click About Microsoft Excel . A window will pop up that displays the current version. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Microsoft Excel app.
steps.content: Open the Microsoft Excel app. This looks like two green rectangles with an x in the smaller one. Microsoft Excel is available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store .

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. If you're logged into your Microsoft account, this will be in the top-left corner.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . This is at the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Scroll down to find the version number.
steps.content: Scroll down to find the version number. This will be underneath the Advanced header, underneath Privacy Settings .
